props.name: accessibilityLabel
props.description: Visually hidden text for screen readers used for item link

props.name: name
props.description: Individual item name used by various text labels

props.name: ariaControls
props.description: Id of the element the item onClick controls

props.name: ariaExpanded
props.description: Tells screen reader the controlled element is expanded

props.name: media
props.description: Content for the media area at the left of the item, usually an Avatar or Thumbnail

props.name: persistActions
props.description: Makes the shortcut actions always visible

props.name: shortcutActions
props.description: 1 or 2 shortcut actions; must be available on the page linked to by url

props.name: sortOrder
props.description: The order the item is rendered

props.name: url
props.description: URL for the resourceâ€™s details page (required unless onClick is provided)

props.name: external
props.description: Allows url to open in a new tab

props.name: onClick
props.description: Callback when clicked (required if url is omitted)
